summary.para: The DVD_TitleAttributes structure contains information about a DVD title.

remarks.para: By default, the DVD Navigator uses the AppMode member of the anonymous union to report the title mode.
If the application sets the DVD_EnableTitleLength option to TRUE, the DVD Navigator uses the TitleLength member of the union to report the title length. To set this option, call the method.

summary.para: A variable of type indicating whether the Navigator is in karaoke mode.
A structure containing information about the "main" video of the current menu or title.
The number of audio streams available in the title.
An array of structures containing information about each available audio stream in the current title.
The number of subpicture streams available in the title.
An array of structures that contain information about each available subpicture stream in the title.
